casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
David Leroy CARVER No. 196A19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 17, 2019 Leslie S. Robinson, Greenville, Attorney at Law, for Carver, David Leroy. Douglas W. Corkhill, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. State of N. C. Judicial Dept., for NC Judicial Department.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 28th of May 2019 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of June 2019."
